thread.title: CNN Turns Down Opportunity to Interview Kellyanne Conway
thread.title_full: CNN Turns Down Opportunity to Interview Kellyanne Conway

author: Kevin Drum
title: CNN Turns Down Opportunity to Interview Kellyanne Conway
text:
CNN Turns Down Opportunity to Interview Kellyanne Conway Kevin Drum Feb. 4, 2017 11:33 AM Email 
CNN, which is the target of a boycott by the Trump administration, turned down an opportunity to have Kellyanne Conway on its Sunday show: 
Why did CNN do this? If it's just pique over being denied access to Pence, then boo. If it's because Conway is such a serial liar that no self-respecting news outlet should give her air time, then yay. But which is it? Get the scoop, straight from Mother Jones.
